name: Navitel Map
summary: Learn about .NM2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NM2 files can be loaded by Navitel software, which is available for Android and iOS devices. They typically have filenames that describe the location included in the map (such as North Central Croatia.nm2 for a map of north-central Croatia).

description: An NM2 file is a map used by Navitel navigation software. It contains a map of a specific area, including roads, landmarks, GPS coordinates, and other map data.
